name: Oathbreaker
description: Paladins who abandon their sacred oaths embrace dark powers and corruption.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific paladin levels.

3.name: Control Undead
3.description: You seize control of undead creatures.

7.name: Aura of Hate
7.description: You and nearby fiends and undead gain bonus damage.

15.name: Supernatural Resistance
15.description: You gain resistance to nonmagical damage.

20.name: Dread Lord
20.description: You emanate an aura of darkness and fear.
